original_text: Both it and its vestibule had windows all around, like the windows of the others. Its length was fifty cubits, and its breadth twenty-five cubits.
korean_text: 그 문간과 현관 좌우에 있는 창도 먼저 말한 창과 같더라 그 문간의 길이는 쉰 척이요 너비는 스물다섯 척이며

sentences.original_text: Both it and its vestibule had windows all around
sentences.korean_translation: 그것과 그 현관은 사방에 창문이 있었고

sentences.original_text: like the windows of the others.
